item.title: Terminalia chebula Retz. extract ameliorates the symptoms of atopic dermatitis by regulating anti-inflammatory factors in vivo and suppressing STAT1/3 and NF-ĸB signaling in vitro
item.description: Pubmed Link DOI Copyright and License Information Authors: Hye Jin Kim,Hyun-Kyung Song,Sun Haeng Park,Seol Jang,Ki-Sun Park,Kwang Hoon Song,Sang Kook Lee,Taesoo Kim © 2022 The Author(s). Published by Elsevier GmbH. This article is available under the Creative Commons CC-BY-NC-ND license and permits non-commercial use of the work as published, without adaptation or alteration provided the work is fully attributed. Abstract Background: Terminalia chebula (TC) is a traditional medicinal plant used for treating various diseases in humans.
